scripts.replace: replace 'app/viewDisclaimer' 'viewDisclaimer' dist/viewDisclaimer.js && replace 'app/viewAlgo' 'viewAlgo' dist/viewAlgo.js && replace 'app/viewPrakriti' 'viewPrakriti' dist/viewPrakriti.js && replace 'app/viewGoodWord' 'viewGoodWord' dist/viewGoodWord.js
scripts.buildJS: uglifyjs app/bower_components/angular/angular.js app/bower_components/angular-route/angular-route.min.js app/app.js app/viewGoodWord/*.js app/viewDisclaimer/*.js app/viewAlgo/*.js app/viewPrakriti/*.js dist/viewGoodWord.js dist/viewDisclaimer.js dist/viewAlgo.js dist/viewPrakriti.js --screw-ie8 -b -o dist/bundle.js
